mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post ( name, isAdmin, contents, createdTime, views, categoryId, userId, fileId, updatedTime) VALUES (#{name}, #{isAdmin}, #{contents}, #{createdTime}, #{views}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{fileId}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY createdTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET name = #{name}, contents = #{contents}, views = #{views}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, userId = #{userId}, fileId = #{fileId}, updatedTime = #{updatedTime} WHERE id = #{id}
